descriptionHTML:
System info provides system, cpu, process, storage, temperature and memory informations for your wearable in one single app. Download now for free. To start the app. Just say: OK Google...Start system info.


Get more apps, games & news about Android Wear with "Android Wear Center": http://tinyurl.com/m87stxs


Features:
★ CPU usage display, statistic & history
★ Determine processes with high CPU usage
★ Memory usage display (free / total)
★ Storage usage display (free / total)
★ CPU Temperatue display
★ Display model informations
★ Display system informations
★ Display build informations


Please note:
-Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear.
-Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear App.
-To open: Go to "Start..." and open the app "System Info" or say "Start system info"


Do you have any suggestions for improvement? Any ideas? Any issues with the app? Please let us know.
comments: Works well but missing something It works on the Asus Smart watch 2 but a big thing missing is the ability to switch the temperature read out from degrees Celsius to Fahrenheit.
Works great.. Does what it says Nice way to  check basic information about your phone..  I wish there was a battery usage screen that showed estimated battery life left...
Great but... Great app! However PLEASE fix the temperature. Here in the US we use farenhiet not Celsius. ONCE this is fixed and both parties can use the temp correctly then it will be 5 starts!
Pretty good at what it does. Unfortunately, that doesn't include a breakdown of ram usage by process, which is the only thing I needed it for.
Great App to Have For Geeks App works great. Gives system info that should be standard on Andriod Wear. Only reason i didn't give 5 stars was because temp is in Celsius not F.
Once installed cannot uninstall it Not saying is a bad app. But once i ve install it I could not uninstall if from my watch. Had to factory reset it..
